thread.title: Start times for all ALCS games announced
thread.title_full: Start times for all ALCS games announced - KCTV5

author: Laura McCallister, Multimedia Producer
title: Start times for all ALCS games announced
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - Major League Baseball has announced the dates and times for all the games in the American League Championship Series.
On Friday the Kansas City Royals face off against the Toronto Blue Jays. First pitch is at 7:07 p.m. for Game 1 at Kauffman Stadium.
On Saturday the two teams meet up for Game 2 at Kauffman Stadium. First pitch is at 3:07 p.m.
On Monday, ALCS game 3 will be at Rogers Centre in Toronto. First pitch is at 7:07 p.m.
For Game 4, first pitch is at 3:07 p.m. Tuesday.
If Game 5 is necessary in Toronto on Wednesday, first pitch is at 3:07 p.m. With New York and Chicago, the two largest media markets playing for the NLCS, they get primetime.
If Game 6 and 7 are needed, the teams will return to Kansas City. Game 6 would be at 7:07 p.m. Friday while a decisive Game 7 would be at 7:07 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 24.
